name: AstraZeneca
description: AstraZeneca is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company that focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of prescription medicines in Oncology, Rare Diseases, and BioPharmaceuticals.

name: Genentech
description: Genentech, a member of the Roche Group, is a leading biotechnology company focused on discovering, developing, and delivering medicines for patients with serious and life-threatening conditions.

name: Merck
description: Merck & Co., known as MSD outside of the United States and Canada, is a global healthcare company that delivers innovative health solutions through its prescription medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, and animal health products.

name: BMS
description: Bristol Myers Squibb is a global biopharmaceutical company focused on discovering, developing, and delivering innovative medicines for patients with serious diseases in areas including oncology, hematology, immunology, and cardiovascular.

name: Novartis
description: Novartis is a global healthcare company based in Switzerland that provides solutions to address the evolving needs of patients worldwide through innovative medicines, data science and advanced therapy platforms.

name: Pfizer
description: Pfizer Inc. is an American multinational pharmaceutical and biotechnology corporation that develops and produces medicines and vaccines for a wide range of medical disciplines.

name: Gilead
description: Gilead Sciences, Inc. is an American biopharmaceutical company that researches, develops and commercializes drugs, with a primary focus on antiviral medications for the treatment of HIV, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, and influenza.

name: Amgen
description: Amgen Inc. is an American multinational biopharmaceutical company that discovers, develops, manufactures and delivers human therapeutics worldwide through a focus on biotechnology innovations.

name: Roche
description: Roche is a Swiss multinational healthcare company that operates worldwide under two divisions: Pharmaceuticals and Diagnostics. Its holding company, Roche Holding AG, has bearer shares listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange.

name: J&J
description: Johnson & Johnson is an American multinational corporation that develops medical devices, pharmaceuticals, and consumer packaged goods. Its pharmaceutical division, Janssen, focuses on developing innovative treatments.
